name: digitalpine
description: Curated Claude Code plugins by Digital Pine. Framework setup, auditing, and modernization skills built from real-world production experience.

plugins.name: biome
plugins.description: Setup, configure, audit, and optimize Biome linter/formatter. Covers installation, migration from ESLint+Prettier, unsafe fix workflows, Next.js integration, and team configuration.

plugins.name: vitest
plugins.description: Setup, configure, audit, and modernize Vitest testing. Covers v4.0+ best practices, Jest migration, browser mode, visual regression testing, coverage, and CI integration.

plugins.name: nextjs-16
plugins.description: Setup, configure, audit, and modernize Next.js 16 projects. Covers Cache Components, proxy.ts migration, async APIs, Turbopack, Biome integration, shadcn/ui, and Vercel flags.

plugins.name: docker
plugins.description: Docker guidance for fast-moving teams. Starts with 'do you need a Dockerfile?' decision tree. Covers multi-stage builds, security hardening, BuildKit optimization, and language-specific patterns.

plugins.name: golang
plugins.description: Setup, audit, and modernize Go projects with 2025 best practices. Two tiers: quick start (minimal friction) or full setup (production-ready). Covers project structure, linting, testing, and CI.
